channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: ‘Extended reality’ to create 860K jobs by 2025: EU Commission
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: The European Commission has laid out its plans for becoming a “world leader” in Web 4.0 and the Metaverse.

item.title: Cboe refiles 5 Bitcoin ETFs to include Coinbase surveillance agreements
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The surveillance-sharing agreements are a measure recommended by the SEC in March, which says they can prevent fraud and protect investors.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: US Senate Finance Committee asks digital asset community how to tax it in open letter
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Community members may want to read up on the intricacies of tax law before they respond, but they have two months to do so.

item.title: Experiments show AI could help to audit smart contracts, but not yet
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Mariko Wakabayashi
item.description: Artificial intelligence has proven effective at identifying security vulnerabilities, but early tests indicate it won’t be able to replace humans for a while.

item.title: Grayscale resolves lawsuit with Fir Tree over proposed changes to Bitcoin Trust
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Fir Tree hinted at potential additional litigation against Grayscale and parent company Digital Currency Group based on what its GBTC documentation may reveal.

item.title: BIS gives CBDCs a thumbs up, crypto the middle finger in reports to G20 ministers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: G20 finance ministers and central bank governors are meeting this month, and the Bank for International Settlements has findings to present.

item.title: IMF sees climate change, DAOs, CBDC as threats to Marshall Islands, urges reforms
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Entering the crypto economy is not a good idea for a country with “capacity constraints” and no central bank, the IMF thinks.

item.title: Anthropic launches Claude 2 amid continuing AI hullabaloo
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The new model demonstrates measurable improvements across numerous categories, including near-instant query response times and the ability to parse inputs up to 100K tokens in size.

item.title: Multichain Executor has been ‘draining’ AnySwap tokens: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The contract has used an “anySwapFeeTo” function to transfer hundreds of thousands of dollars worth of tokens to itself, which on-chain sleuth Spreek suspected may have been malicious.

item.title: FTX claims portal becomes unavailable shortly after going live
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: Users affected by the bankruptcy of FTX or certain subsidiaries have the option of filing a proof-of-claim through Kroll’s online customer form or via U.S. mail.

item.title: Cardano network activity and ADA’s oversold price action hint at a powerful breakout
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: On-chain growth, a surge in DeFi use and a positive technical outlook could signal a breakout in the ADA price.

item.title: Bitcoin continues dominance as 3rd week of fund inflows correct previous months’ outflows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Blockchain equities inflows reached a recent high of $15 million as well. However, total trading volume dropped.

item.title: UK Treasury plans to exclude derivatives and ‘unbacked’ tokens from regulatory sandbox
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: “Until there is more certainty in these frameworks, we are intending to utilise existing regulatory initiatives to develop policy and regulation for this asset class,” said Treasury.

item.title: Bitcoin ETF hopium fades as on-chain and futures data reflect traders’ muted activity
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: BTC’s price soared on investors’ ETF hopes, but on-chain and derivatives metrics indicate a limited inflow of new investors

item.title: Algorand decentralized lending protocol Algofi to shut down by end of year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Developers say building the borrowing and lending protocol is "no longer a viable path" for Algorand.

item.title: BlackRock Bitcoin ETF could unlock $30 trillion worth of wealth, Bloomberg analyst says
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marco Castrovilli
item.description: Following the Blackrock application, a Bitcoin spot ETF was never so close to being approved and it could be a game changer for the crypto industry, explains ETF analyst Eric Balchunas.

item.title: 5 High-risk, high-reward crypto to invest in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph
item.description: Navigating the turbulent crypto market environment can be a thrilling venture for those willing to take on an element of risk.

item.title: US authorities are investigating former FTX exec for potential campaign finance violations: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: FTX Digital Markets co-CEO Ryan Salame was the individual who first reported FTX to Bahmanian authorities, but he reportedly may face charges of his own in the United States.

item.title: Bitcoin exchanges now hold the same BTC supply share as in late 2017
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC supply dynamics are pointing firmly in Bitcoin bulls’ favor, as an analyst says that “true price discovery” may come as a result.

item.title: Near Foundation treasury drops to $900M as token price plunges
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The $200 million decline was mostly due to a drop in the price of Near tokens, in line with the crypto bear market.

item.title: 10 tips for blockchain-based data providers seeking to scale
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Blockchain-based data providers are faced with a golden opportunity — if they’re able to scale their infrastructure to handle the demand.

item.title: ConsenSys launches Linea zkEVM to further scale Ethereum
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: ConsenSys rolls scaling network Linea, which delivered faster throughput and 15 times lower transaction costs than Ethereum’s layer 1.

item.title: Bug bounties can help secure blockchain networks, but have mixed results
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Anthony Clarke
item.description: How bug bounties can improve security by using talent from the blockchain community.

item.title: US senators to have classified AI briefing at the White House
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: U.S. senators will take part in the country’s first-ever classified Senate briefing on AI, which will place in conjunction with the Department of Defense and the Intelligence Community.

item.title: Why is Polygon (MATIC) price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: Why is Polygon Price Up Today
item.description: MATIC’s price is up today as traders assess the appointment of a new CEO and amid surging whale activity ahead of a key network update.

item.title: Axelar partners with Microsoft for hybrid blockchain solutions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Through the collaboration, Axelar will be the first cross-chain protocol to join Microsoft’s Azure marketplace.

item.title: Arbitrum-based Rodeo Finance exploited for second time, $1.5M stolen
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The exploiter manipulated price oracles to gain the upper hand on trades executed using the manipulated price.

item.title: China could benefit from yuan stablecoin over its CBDC — Circle CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: China may have banned the use of cryptocurrencies, but stablecoins might have a role to play in the proliferation of its national currency.

item.title: Mt. Gox repayment date looming: Is Bitcoin in trouble?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: As the Mt. Gox October repayment deadline approaches, crypto observers expect a major industry event this fall.
